Text: I was hoping someone would share this. Thanks so much!
Really fun and simple game. Thanks!

My antivirus detects virus(Norton Internet security ) and it automatically deletes the .exe file

Sorry If i am wrong..  (My be its false detection) Any way Thanks THETA :-) I love your torrents
THE FCL? You fuckers begged me to port this game to PC and this is how you repay us? I'm never going to port any other games again. Go scl a fcling dcl ye.
Any word on that detection? Heuristics? What does it "detect"? The usual stuff, dropper or something?

Yep malware detected with a scan. Used malware bytes. Avast didn't detect it like it usually does when I downloaded it. Noticed problems after downloading and they got better when I got rid of it. Don't download this guys.
I'm guessing what's being detected as a virus, is the nfoviewer program. Everything I tested that on, has shown it to be a virus.
